result.execSummary:
The defendant Mitchell K. Hazzard was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mitchell K. Hazzard

ADDRESS INFO for Mitchell K. Hazzard
Current: 6331 13th Avenue  Upper, Kenosha, WI 53143 United States  (Effective: 05-11-2016)

Change of Address Form

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Deft pleads guilty.  Court finds deft guilty.  Court imposes $100 fine plus costs, deft to submit DNA sample and pay $200 DNA surcharge, bond applied, any remainder of bond to be returned to poster.
With Atty Edwards and by agreement of ADA Phan the STC of 4/22/16 at 9:30am is rescheduled, as deft is not available; reset to 5/10/16 at 8:45am.
Deft appeared late and was given new court date.

Judge Barbara A. Kluka, Acting Br. 6 today only.  Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the County.  Atty H Edwadrs appeared on behalf of deft.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Edwards waives appearance of deft.  For reasons set forth on the record, STC continued to 4/22/16 at 9:30am.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Edwards states she was unable to file a collateral attack motion as there was no OWI 1st pursued, believes she can obtain proof from Green Bay.  ADA Phan filed joinder motion.  Atty Edwards opposes motion; requests to adjourn the trial date.  Court grants adjournment of trial date; JS of 4/18/16 at 8:30am is changed to a STC; State's joinder motion will be addressed at this time.  Bond continued.
State's Notice Regarding Deft's statements.
to consolidate cases for trial; filed by ADA Jennifer Phan.
Deft called stating he was given until 12/28/15 to turn himself into Lake County; advised of his new court dates and he stated that should be fine.
Jury selection at 04-18-2016 08:30 am
Motion hearing at 04-01-2016 08:30 am

With Atty Edwards and by agreement of ADA Phan the MH of 1/7/16 at 2pm is rescheduled, as the deft is turning himself into Lake County today for a 6 month jail sentence which should result in him actually serving 90 days; the MH is reset to 4/1/16 at 8:30am; the JS of 3/7/16 at 8:30am is rescheduled to 4/18/16 at 8:30am.

Attorney Carli McNeill appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Edwards states she intends to file a motion for a collateral attack on the underlying OWI.  MH/BBH set for 1/7/16 at 2pm; JS set for 3/7/16 at 8:30am.  Bond continued.
Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Def. appeared with Atty Hilard Edwards.  Clerk K. Zirbel.  Case trails 15CT182.  Status conf 11/23/15 at 1:30.  Bond continued.

Attorney Jennifer Phan appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney H Edwards.  Clerk/H. Barnett.  Atty Edwards states the deft is signing up for Birds of a Feather but needs to pay before he can attend.  FPT set for 10/13/15 at 8:45am.  Bond continued.
File sent to Br 6.
